data.name: National Suicide Prevention Lifeline (US)
data.description: 24/7, free and confidential support for people in distress, prevention and crisis resources for you or your loved ones

data.name: Crisis Text Line (US)
data.description: Free 24/7 support with a trained Crisis Counselor via text messaging

data.name: AASRA (India)
data.description: A crisis intervention center aimed at prevention of suicide and providing emotional support

data.name: Vandrevala Foundation (India)
data.description: 24/7 helpline providing support to people experiencing emotional distress and suicidal thoughts

data.name: iCall (India)
data.description: Psychosocial helpline providing counseling, information, and referrals to people in emotional distress
data.hours: Monday to Saturday, 10:00 AM to 8:00 PM

data.name: NIMHANS Mental Health Helpline (India)
data.description: National Institute of Mental Health and Neurosciences helpline for mental health support and guidance

data.name: Roshni Trust (India)
data.description: Hyderabad-based helpline for individuals dealing with suicidal thoughts and emotional distress

data.name: Mann Talks (India)
data.description: A mental wellness helpline for emotional support and crisis intervention
data.hours: 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM, Monday to Saturday

data.name: SAMHSA's National Helpline (US)
data.description: Treatment referral and information service for individuals facing mental health or substance use disorders

data.name: National Domestic Violence Hotline (US)
data.description: Support for victims and survivors of domestic violence

data.name: Women's Helpline (India)
data.description: National helpline for women facing violence or harassment

data.name: Sahai Helpline (India)
data.description: Bangalore-based suicide prevention and emotional support helpline
data.hours: 10:00 AM to 8:00 PM, Monday to Saturday

data.name: Lifeline Foundation (India)
data.hours: 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM, Monday to Friday

data.name: TISS iCall (India)
data.description: Professional counseling by trained mental health professionals
data.hours: Monday to Saturday, 8:00 AM to 10:00 PM

data.name: The Trevor Project (US)
data.description: Crisis intervention and suicide prevention for LGBTQ young people
